[Doawnload Articles](#wos-results) ## Web Of Science ### WoS database: Access [**Acces to Web Of Science**](https://www-webofscience-com.bases-doc.univ-lorraine.fr/wos/woscc/basic-search) ![](figures/wos-01.png){fig-align="center"} ### WoS database: Download `.bib` **Download documents in format `.bib`** ![](figures/wos-02.png) ### WoS database: full record **Download documents in format `.bib`** ![](figures/wos-03.png) ## Bibliometrix ### Bibliometrix: Access [Connectez-vous at https://posit.cloud/content/7229125](https://posit.cloud/content/7229125) ![](figures/bibliometrix-00.png) ### Bibliometrix: Interface of R ![](figures/bibliometrix-01.png) ### Bibliometrix: Interface ![](figures/bibliometrix-02.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-03.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-04.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-05.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-06.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-07.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-08.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-09.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-10.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-11.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-12.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-13.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-14.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-15.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-16.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-17.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-18.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-19.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-20.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-21.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-22.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-23.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-24.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-25.png) ### Bibliometrix: ![](figures/bibliometrix-26.png)

include-after-body:
<script>
  // htmlwidgets need to know to resize themselves when slides are shown/hidden.
  // Fire the "slideenter" event (handled by htmlwidgets.js) when the current
  // slide changes (different for each slide format).
  (function () {
    // dispatch for htmlwidgets
    function fireSlideEnter() {
      const event = window.document.createEvent("Event");
      event.initEvent("slideenter", true, true);
      window.document.dispatchEvent(event);
    }

    function fireSlideChanged(previousSlide, currentSlide) {
      fireSlideEnter();

      // dispatch for shiny
      if (window.jQuery) {
        if (previousSlide) {
          window.jQuery(previousSlide).trigger("hidden");
        }
        if (currentSlide) {
          window.jQuery(currentSlide).trigger("shown");
        }
      }
    }

    // hookup for slidy
    if (window.w3c_slidy) {
      window.w3c_slidy.add_observer(function (slide_num) {
        // slide_num starts at position 1
        fireSlideChanged(null, w3c_slidy.slides[slide_num - 1]);
      });
    }

  })();
</script>
